Package org.securecryptoconfig

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PlaintextContainerInterface
    Abstract Class for a container representing the plaintext processed in cryptographic use cases.
    SecureCryptoConfigInterface
    Interface that defines which methods should be used for cryptography operations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractSCCCiphertext
    Abstract Class for a Container for the ciphertext (as result from encrypting a plaintext/plaintextcontainer).
    AbstractSCCHash
    Abstract Class for a Container for a Cryptographic Hash.
    AbstractSCCKey
    Abstract Class for the Container of a key or keypair used for cryptography operations like symmetric or asymmetric encryption.
    AbstractSCCPasswordHash
    Abstract Class for a Container for a Cryptographic Password Hash.
    AbstractSCCSignature
    Abstract class for a Container for a Digital Signature.
    JSONReader
    Class for handling/parsing SCC file content
    PlaintextContainer
    Class representing the plaintext processed in cryptographic use cases.
    PlaintextOutputStream  
    SCCAlgorithmParameters  
    SCCCiphertext
    Container for the ciphertext (as result from encrypting a plaintext/plaintextcontainer).
    SCCCiphertextOutputStream  
    SCCHash
    Container for a Cryptographic Hash.
    SCCKey
    Container for a key or keypair used for cryptography operations like symmetric or asymmetric encryption.
    SCCKeyPair  
    SCCParser  
    SCCPasswordHash
    Container for a Cryptographic Password Hash.
    SCCSignature
    Container for a Digital Signature.
    SecureCryptoConfig
    Encapsulates Cryptography Use Cases, Configuration, and Parsing Logic of the Secure Crypto Config.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JSONReader.CryptoUseCase  
    SCCKey.KeyType
    Type of the corresponding key.
    SCCKey.KeyUseCase
    Different use cases for which a key can be created.
    SecureCryptoConfig.SCCAlgorithm
    All supported algorithm names
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SCCException
    General Exception of the Secure Crypto Config.
